extendedInfo.description: Q: WHAT ARE USERS SAYING? A: Users are addicted! See for yourselfâ¦ "I havenât seen any other Q&A app with location-based services!!! Pretty cool to see what people are asking near me!" - Socr187 "I went to Las Vegas and used it every day more than once to get around the city, find out show times and prices. It was more helpful than our concierge!" â Amanda G. "Easy peasy! Loving the new app. So easy to use and really interesting to c what others are asking near me! Thx ChaCha!" - S.neut "I landed in San Francisco and I just learned the toll fees increased and where to find the best burrito in town. Very cool." â Shawn S. Q: WHAT IS CHACHA? A: ChaCha is the leading source for FREE real-time Answers! Through its "ask-a-smart-friend" platform, ChaCha has answered over 2 Billion Questions and owns the worldâs largest Q&A database. Use the ChaCha app to get FREE Answers in a fun & entertaining experience! Q: WHAT'S NEW? A: Widely popular with our SMS users, Shortcuts are now available! Need a quick joke? Want a smooth pickup line? Looking to stump your friends with riddle? Keep these quick answers coming with just a click of a button!-Additional Photo Galleries for your viewing pleasure!-Search Galleries for your favorite topics!-Bug Fixesâ¦-And more!Q: WHY THE CHACHA APP? A: In addition to the newest features mentioned above, youâll also experience these features: - Ask any Question â Ask anything, anytime, anywhere! - 'Near Me' & Real-time map â See Questions being asked near you - Photo Galleries â Browse ChaCha.com's entertaining photo galleries! - Shortcuts â Need a quick joke or riddle to stump your friend?  Easy clicking to keep them coming !- Rate Answers â Flag an incorrect answer or promote a great one! - ChaCha alerts â Sign up for nearly 70 ChaCha text alerts based on your schedule & favorite topics - Easy sharing â Share a great Answer with friends via Facebook, text, and email - And more!

reviews.title: Ehh
reviews.comment: Really slow and unresponsive when switching from Map to My Answers. Probably even from switching from Map to anything else. Reinstall didn\'t fix on my Nexus 7. Please fix. UPDATE: Now crashes when switching from Maps to ANYTHING. FIX. STILL ON NEXUS 7.
reviews.author: Joel Espinoza

reviews.title: Informational & entertaining wait time, TERRIBLE!
reviews.comment: Wth! My phone times out before some categories even come up! Too sloooooooooow. . .
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not all that good...
reviews.comment: Very slow. Its ridiculous.
reviews.author: Sir Abyss

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: This app is very useful, however it does not function very well. I have to send most questions three times and the structure of the app is quite poor. I still recommend it however.
reviews.author: Jeffrey Lewis

reviews.title: Terrible Interface
reviews.comment: I can\'t even type a question in. After 2 seconds of inactivity it removes keyboard. Then it\'s impossible to get back to typing because it keeps on closing.
reviews.author: Trevor Hansen

reviews.title: Slow
reviews.comment: Extremely slow. Sent question 20 minutes ago and still no answer. Its much faster to Google your questions.
reviews.author: Taylor Shaw

reviews.title: The app barley works
reviews.comment: The first few minutes were great. Now I can\'t ask questions and the app is extremely slow.
reviews.author: Marshal Borner

reviews.title: Inaccurate Answers
reviews.comment: The app only allowed me to ask questions during my trial, and now that I\'ve logged in, won\'t allow me to ask questions at all. When I did receive answers, they were inaccurate and seemed rushed. I like the idea, but the app is garbage and the ChaCha \"experts\" do not take their time to provide accurate answers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not good!
reviews.comment: Its very slow and after 4 questions doesn\'t let me ask anymore! Absolutley not reconended!!
reviews.author: Brenda Rojas

reviews.comment: Well I do like this app, and the whole idea, but I really wish the pages would load faster and when you type in a question it should not just send you to the same page you were just on, fix these and 5 stars for sure
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Uninstall!!! B.S. app
reviews.comment: Im uninstalling this app as soon as im done writing this review, this app is nothing but bull, only works for the trial period, when it makes u sign up for an account, it will not work and u can no longer use the app. Only got to ask 3 questions.. These bad reviews are true, do not download this app!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works well if you\'re patient.
reviews.comment: It works the way it\'s supposed to but the app is pretty slow and I really don\'t like the red x everywhere I touch.. I did really like how cha cha finds questions relevant to your own.
reviews.author: Miranda McMurtrey

reviews.title: HTC one s
reviews.comment: This really sucks! It won\'t even let me see the answers. Ans it crashes! Very Bad!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: glitchy
reviews.comment: I love the app, but it\'s really glitchy. It freezes most of the time and it won\'t let me verify my cell phone number.
reviews.author: ME15xAN24

reviews.title: Keeps Freezing
reviews.comment: I click On a question and it freezes and locks up my phone...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its awesome *.*
reviews.comment: It works great and gives me right answers
reviews.author: Isabel Ferreira

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.comment: Worked at first but now every time I ask a question it sends me to the profile page. Tried logging out and back in and now it says invalid login. Don\'t download this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: SAD
reviews.comment: Cha cha used to be my favorite app until they changed the format all up a long time ago now the app is glitchy complicated and all together below standard... C\'mon cha cha your better than this
reviews.author: Chris Namor

reviews.title: Chacha again!
reviews.comment: great app but it still has a few bugs, it doesn\'t respond to the phones back button but over all great app for quick and correct  answers
reviews.author: Edwin Guzman

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: This app doesn\'t work at all! I like the idea but I don\'t like the way nothing loads & everythings slow. If the problem is fixed, I\'ll give you 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User
